title: Neurotransmitters Basics
subject: Neurochemistry
description: The role of neurotransmitters in brain function and behavior
notes: Dopamine is responsible for pleasure and reward
Glutamate is the main excitatory neurotransmitter
GABA is the main inhibitory neurotransmitter
Acetylcholine is involved in learning and memory

flashcards.back: Responsible for pleasure, reward, and motivation

Main inhibitory neurotransmitter, reduces neural activity
Important for learning, memory, and muscle activation
Involved in alertness, attention, and stress response
Natural painkillers, released during exercise and pleasure
Involved in social bonding and trust
Transmits pain signals to the brain
